Read metabolon

read_metabolon.Rd

Read metabolon

.read_metabolon(
  file,
  sheet = find_origscale_sheet(file),
  fid_var = "(COMP|COMP_ID)",
  sid_var = "(CLIENT_IDENTIFIER|Client ID)",
  subgroup_var = "Group",
  fname_var = "BIOCHEMICAL"
)

read_metabolon(
  file,
  sheet = find_origscale_sheet(file),
  fid_var = "(COMP|COMP_ID)",
  sid_var = "(CLIENT_IDENTIFIER|Client ID)",
  subgroup_var = "Group",
  fname_var = "BIOCHEMICAL",
  impute = FALSE,
  add_kegg_pathways = FALSE,
  add_smiles = FALSE,
  formula = if (single_subgroup(object)) ~1 else ~0 + subgroup,
  contrastdefs = contrast_subgroups(object),
  verbose = TRUE,
  plot = TRUE
)

Arguments

file

string: path to metabolon xlsx file
sheet

number/string: xls sheet number or name
fid_var

string: feature_id variable (ideally transcends dataset)
sid_var

string: sample_id variable
subgroup_var

string: subgroup variable (human comprehensible)
fname_var

string: feature_name variable
impute

TRUE / FALSE
add_kegg_pathways

TRUE / FALSE
add_smiles

TRUE / FALSE
formula

formula to create design matrix (using svars)
contrastdefs

contrastdef vector/matrix/list
verbose

TRUE / FALSE
plot

TRUE / FALSE

Value

SummarizedExperiment

Examples

# GLUTAMINASE
   file <- download_data('halama18.metabolon.xlsx')
   read_metabolon(file)

#> 	Read: ~/autonomicscache/datasets/halama18/halama18.metabolon.xlsx
#> 		Infer design from sample_ids
#> 		Guess replicate values from sampleids: ctrl_h10_R1 => R1
#> 		Log2 transform
#> 	Add PCA
#> 		Retain 391/391 features: non-zero, non-NA, and non-NaN for some sample
#> 		Run limma
#> 		Retain 96/96 samples: ~!is.na(~subgroup)
#> class: SummarizedExperiment 
#> dim: 391 96 
#> metadata(7): analysis file ... contrastdefs limma
#> assays(1): exprs
#> rownames(391): 52603 52457 ... 54834 54859
#> rowData names(20): feature_id feature_name ... F F.p
#> colnames(96): ctrl_h10_R1 ctrl_h10_R2 ... uM10_h72_R5 uM10_h72_R6
#> colData names(15): sample_id subgroup ... pca1 pca2
# HYPOGLYCEMIA
   file <- download_data('atkin18.metabolon.xlsx')
   read_metabolon(file)

#> 	Read: ~/autonomicscache/datasets/atkin18/atkin18.metabolon.xlsx
#> 		Infer design from sample_ids
#> 		Guess subgroup values: t0.C01 => t0
#> 		Guess replicate values from sampleids: t0.C01 => C01
#> 		Log2 transform
#> 	Add PCA
#> 		Retain 975/975 features: non-zero, non-NA, and non-NaN for some sample
#> 		Run limma
#> 		Retain 67/67 samples: ~!is.na(~subgroup)
#> class: SummarizedExperiment 
#> dim: 975 67 
#> metadata(7): analysis file ... contrastdefs limma
#> assays(1): exprs
#> rownames(975): 48762 34404 ... 49260 49562
#> rowData names(20): feature_id feature_name ... F F.p
#> colnames(67): t0.C01 t0.C02 ... t3.D18 t3.D19
#> colData names(17): sample_id subgroup ... pca1 pca2
